attributes.action: All politicians to be removed from office if we're kept in the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
Just need a few local nominated people in constituencies to put forward our cases to Brussels.
Much cheaper than politicians wages & expense accounts?
attributes.background: If they keep us in the EU why do we need them if we're ruled by Brussels.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes petitions calling for MPs or the Prime Minister to lose their job.

If you would like a general election, you may wish to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
